attributes.additional_details: Ban homework or limit it down
attributes.background: Ban Homework from schools because we have to do 5 hours of learning a day and it doesnt help that I have no free time at home because I have to do more work

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Abolish homework across all secondary schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550825

Review amount of homework schools set and issue guidance limiting this: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551955
